item.title: CVE-2022-23982|2024-09-17T01:27:02.232Z -- quadlayers -- perfect%20brands%20for%20woocommerce%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: The vulnerability discovered in WordPress Perfect Brands for WooCommerce plugin (versions <= 2.0.4) allows server information exposure.

item.title: CVE-2023-47681|2024-07-02T17:05:07.786Z -- quadlayers -- woocommerce%20checkout%20manager
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in QuadLayers WooCommerce Checkout Manager.This issue affects WooCommerce Checkout Manager: from n/a through 7.3.0.
